title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 43-1.13 - Audits by local health officials
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 43-1.13 - Audits by local health officials

State Regulations

Local health officials shall audit a sufficient number of provider reports, medical records, and if necessary, interview physicians and other personnel to determine whether a provider has furnished or is furnishing tuberculosis health care services in accordance with the requirements of this Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
43-1.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
